name: Koppert Biological Systems
membership: IBMA, EBIC, Freshfel, IPIFF, LTO Nederland, Glastuinbouw Nederland, GlobalGAP, Ecofi, Artemis, EIT Food
goal: Koppert provides an integrated system of specialist knowledge and natural, safe solutions that improves crop health, resilience and production.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Organic legislation, circular economy, fertilizers regulation revision, regulation (EC) 1107/2009 for the EU autorization of low risk active substances, Sustainable Use Directive.
